answers.author: Caitlyn Mitchell
answers.text:
Steelintheair.com offers a free evaluation of water tower sites. They are a Florida based company that helps cities maximize their leasing opportunities. 
http://www.steelintheair.com/Blog/category/water-tower

author: Frank Thomas
text: Does anyone have a Request for Proposals for leasing space on an elevated water tower? We have had several inquiries and are looking to do this to bring in more revenue.
title: RFP for Leasing space on an elevated Water Tower.
